name: ITX 230.01.E – Withholding Tax Statement
query:
SELECT cmp.tax_id AS "TIN:Data:0",
       pi.company AS "Withholder:Data:0",
       cmp.p_o_box AS "P O Box:Data:0",
       cmp.city AS "City:Data:0",
       cmp.plot_number AS "Plot No.:Data:0",
       cmp.block_number AS "Block No.:Data:0",
       cmp.street AS "Street:Data:0",
       cmp.phone_no AS "Phone:Data:0",
       cmp.fax AS "Fax:Data:0",
       cmp.email AS "Email:Data:0",
       pi.tax_id AS "Withholdee TIN:Data:0",
       pi.supplier AS "Withholdee:Data:0",
       addr.pincode AS "Withholdee Post:Data:0",
       addr.city AS "Withholdee City:Data:0",
       pii.base_amount AS "Gross Payment:Currency:0",
       pii.withholding_tax_rate as "Withholding Rate::0",
       if(pii.withholding_tax_rate = 5, 'Service', 'Rent') as "Withholding Type:Data:0",
       (pii.withholding_tax_rate/100) * pii.base_amount AS "Tax Withheld:Currency:0"
FROM `tabPurchase Invoice` pi LEFT JOIN `tabPurchase Invoice Item` pii ON pi.name = pii.parent
                              LEFT JOIN `tabCompany` cmp ON pi.company = cmp.company_name
                              LEFT JOIN `tabAddress` addr ON pi.supplier = addr.address_title and addr.is_primary_address = 1
WHERE pii.withholding_tax_rate > 0
AND   pi.docstatus = 1
AND   pi.posting_date >= %(from_date)s 
AND   pi.posting_date <= %(to_date)s
